languages.text: "Иду, иду..." {n}За женой идет старик — тот самый, которому вы сохранили жизнь, несмотря на связь с культистами Зари. Он настороженно косится на труп пророчицы, но быстро отводит взгляд и кланяется вам:{/n} "Ваша Светлость!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"
languages.original_text: "Иду, иду..." {n}За женой идет старик — тот самый, которому вы сохранили жизнь, несмотря на связь с культистами Зари. Он настороженно косится на труп пророчицы, но быстро отводит взгляд и кланяется вам:{/n} "Ваша Светлость!"

traits.locale_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links with Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links with Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

"I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

languages.text: "Ich komme, ich komme ..." {n}Der Alte, der seiner Frau hinterhertrottet, ist der Mann, dessen Leben du trotz seiner Verbindungen zu Auroras Kultisten verschont hast. Er blickt nervös aus dem Augenwinkel auf die Leiche der Prophetin, sieht jedoch schnell wieder weg und verbeugt sich vor dir.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft!"
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich komme, ich komme ..." {n}Der Alte, der seiner Frau hinterhertrottet, ist der Mann, dessen Leben du trotz seiner Verbindungen zu Auroras Kultisten verschont hast. Er blickt nervös aus dem Augenwinkel auf die Leiche der Prophetin, sieht jedoch schnell wieder weg und verbeugt sich vor dir.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft!"

languages.text: « J'arrive, j'arrive... » {n}Le vieillard qui suit son épouse est celui que vous avez épargné malgré ses liens avec les disciples d'Aurore. Il jette un regard anxieux au cadavre de la prophétesse, mais détourne rapidement les yeux pour s'incliner devant vous.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: « J'arrive, j'arrive... » {n}Le vieillard qui suit son épouse est celui que vous avez épargné malgré ses liens avec les disciples d'Aurore. Il jette un regard anxieux au cadavre de la prophétesse, mais détourne rapidement les yeux pour s'incliner devant vous.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: “我来了，我来了……”{n}那个老人跟着他的妻子过来了。尽管他曾与‘极光’的邪教徒沆瀣一气，但你却饶了他一命。他忧虑地瞥了先知的尸体一眼，随后很快移开目光，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人！”
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: “我来了，我来了……”{n}那个老人跟着他的妻子过来了。尽管他曾与‘极光’的邪教徒沆瀣一气，但你却饶了他一命。他忧虑地瞥了先知的尸体一眼，随后很快移开目光，向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人！”

languages.text: 「行くって、行くともさ…」{n}妻の後を付いてきた老人は、オーロラの教団と繋がっていたものの、命を救った男だ。男は心配そうに横目で預言者の死体を見たが、すぐに目をそらしこちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下！」
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「行くって、行くともさ…」{n}妻の後を付いてきた老人は、オーロラの魔女団と繋がっていたものの、命を救った男だ。男は心配そうに横目で預言者の死体を見たが、すぐに目をそらしこちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下！」

languages.text: «Ya voy, ya voy...». {n}El anciano que sigue a su mujer es a quien perdonaste la vida a pesar de sus vínculos con los cultistas de Aurora. Echa una mirada aprensiva de reojo al cadáver de la profeta, pero rápidamente aparta la vista y se inclina ante ti.{/n}«¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!»
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya voy, ya voy...». {n}El anciano que sigue a su mujer es a quien perdonaste la vida a pesar de sus vínculos con los cultistas de Aurora. Echa una mirada aprensiva de reojo al cadáver de la profeta, pero rápidamente aparta la vista y se inclina ante ti.{/n}«¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}!»

languages.text: "Geldim, geldim." {n}Aurora'nın tarikatçılarıyla bağlantısı olmasına rağmen canını bağışladığın yaşlı adam, karısının peşi sıra geliyor. Peygamberin cesedine göz ucuyla ürkek bir bakış atıp ardından süratle gözünü kaçırıyor, önünde başını eğip selam veriyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
languages.original_text: "I'm coming, I'm coming..." {n}The old man trailing his wife is the one whose life you spared despite his links to Aurora's cultists. He casts an apprehensive sideways glance at the prophet's corpse, but quickly looks away and bows to you.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Geldim, geldim..." {n}Aurora'nın tarikatçılarıyla bağlantısı olmasına rağmen hayatını bağışladığın yaşlı adam, karısının peşinden yavaşça geliyor. Peygamberin cesedine ürkek bir bakış atıyor ancak süratle gözünü kaçırıp önünde diz çöküyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri!"
